revised_title: Meteorological Observations and Instruments in Dukhun (Deccan), East Indies
tldr: The author, Lieutenant-Colonel W.H. Sykes, describes his meteorological observations and the instruments used in Dukhun (Deccan), East Indies. He discusses the challenges and limitations of various barometers, thermometers, and hygrometers used during his observations, and provides insights into the atmospheric conditions and weather patterns in the region.
